程序包的使用
org.springframework.cache

  • 使用org.springframework.cache的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.cache
    Spring's generic cache abstraction.
    org.springframework.cache.annotation
    Annotations and supporting classes for declarative cache management.
    org.springframework.cache.concurrent
    Implementation package for java.util.concurrent based caches.
    org.springframework.cache.interceptor
    AOP-based solution for declarative caching demarcation.
    org.springframework.cache.support
    Support classes for the org.springframework.cache package.
  • org.springframework.cache使用的org.springframework.cache中的类 
    类和说明
    Cache
    Interface that defines common cache operations.
    Cache.ValueWrapper
    A (wrapper) object representing a cache value.
  • org.springframework.cache.annotation使用的org.springframework.cache中的类 
    类和说明
    CacheManager
    Spring's central cache manager SPI.
  • org.springframework.cache.concurrent使用的org.springframework.cache中的类 
    类和说明
    Cache
    Interface that defines common cache operations.
    Cache.ValueWrapper
    A (wrapper) object representing a cache value.
    CacheManager
    Spring's central cache manager SPI.
  • org.springframework.cache.interceptor使用的org.springframework.cache中的类 
    类和说明
    Cache
    Interface that defines common cache operations.
    Cache.ValueWrapper
    A (wrapper) object representing a cache value.
    CacheManager
    Spring's central cache manager SPI.
  • org.springframework.cache.support使用的org.springframework.cache中的类 
    类和说明
    Cache
    Interface that defines common cache operations.
    Cache.ValueWrapper
    A (wrapper) object representing a cache value.
    CacheManager
    Spring's central cache manager SPI.
